About Us

This app has been designed to be very user-friendly. With this app, you can search for a stationary or moving delivery service. Just open the app to see available delivery services based on proximity and select anyone. The app allows you to call the delivery service right-away or send your location. All our riders have been certified and verified. Your goods are safe in our hands.

Make money riding

You can register to be part of our riders to deliver goods whiles making money. Registration can be done within the app. Once you are verified, you will be on your way to deliver goods and make money.

Safe & Secured

All our riders have been certified and verified. Your goods are safe in our hands.

The Rider 6 Steps Process

It is easier to make money riding with us than you thought
by just following the six processes below!

Download & Install

Download the app from the Google PlayStore or visit the link to use the web version.

Rider Registration

Create an account and login. Tell us a little about yourself.

Rider Verification

Our team will then verify your information right away to confirm that you are not a robot.

Rider Payment

You will then be required to pay a non-refundable fee which is renewable monthly. You can pay yearly if you choose to.

Go Online

You wil be notified once your account is verified so that you can go online and start to take deliveries.

Make Money

Voila!!! Start making money by taking rides at your own convenience. No commissions. You keep everything you receive.

1

Download the App

Downloading the DeliveryBoss app is as easy as ABC..Get it from playstore or simply use the web app.

2

Search for Riders

Simply open the app to see a list of avaliable riders. You can also search from a desired locality..

3

Choose Rider

Select a rider and tap to call through the app. You can also share your location with the rider..

4

Enjoy & Rate us!

Do you like our app? Do you have concerns?. Rate us or comment on the PlayStore..

What is the DeliveryBoss App ?
This app has been designed to be very user-friendly. With this app, you can search for a stationary or moving delivery service. Just open the app to see available delivery services based on proximity and select anyone. The app allows you to call the delivery service right-away or send your location. All our riders have been certified and verified. Your goods are safe in our hands.
How to install this app ?
Installing the DeliveryBoss app is very easy. Android users can download and install it from the PlayStore. iOS and other users can use the wep app version. We are however working on a stand-alone iOS version.
How do I register to be a Rider ?
To register to be a rider, you do not require a seperate app as all features are bundled within the same app. Simply access the Rider Portal to register and create an account. You will also have to make payment based on the selected package. Once the account is verified, you can go online and start making money.
